title: ‘Fani-Kayode is ‘God’s Finger’ on Southern Kaduna’ - Vanguard News
text:
Home » News » ‘Fani-Kayode is ‘God’s Finger’ on Southern Kaduna’ ‘Fani-Kayode is ‘God’s Finger’ on Southern Kaduna’ On 10:26 am In News by Tony Comments 
The Southern Kaduna Rebirth (SOKARE) has described a former Minister of Aviation, Chief Femi Fani-Kayode, as one of those whose voices have helped in forcing herdsmen to cut down on the scale of terror they planned to unleash on the people of the area. 
In a statement by its Chairman, Peter Ayuba, after a meeting in Abuja, the group described Fani-Kayode’s interest in the killings in Southern Kaduna as the ‘Finger of God’ and highly commendable. They explained that the constant criticism of the likes of the former Aviation Minister that has helped to keep the herdsmen and their sponsors in check. Femi Fani-Kayode 
SOKARE commended the Osun born chief for standing up for them despite not being directly affected by the situation there. “Sometimes we are left to wonder where he finds such strength and motivation but then we remind ourselves of the scripture which declares that the righteous are as bold as a lion and that those who know their God shall be strong and they shall do exploits. In fact, Chief Femi Fani-Kayode is a fulfillment of the scripture that says there is a friend that is closer than a brother,”the group stated. Tony
